title: FOIL Method Calculator – Expand & Factor Binomials

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: \( (ax + b)(cx + d) = \underbrace{acx^2}_{\text{First}} + \underbrace{adx}_{\text{Outer}} + \underbrace{bcx}_{\text{Inner}} + \underbrace{bd}_{\text{Last}} \) So the simplified form is \( acx^2 + (ad + bc)x + bd \).

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: \( (ax + b)(cx + d) = ax(cx + d) + b(cx + d) \) \( = ax \cdot cx + ax \cdot d + b \cdot cx + b \cdot d \).

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: \( (px + q)(rx + s) = prx^2 + (ps + qr)x + qs \) \( pr = a \) \( ps + qr = b \) \( qs = c \)

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
